troubleshooting.title: Ring light does not turn on

condition.title: The ring light does not turn on when the power button is pressed.

cause.title: No power
cause.p: The problem is usually due to the power not being supplied to the system through the electrical outlet.

remedy.title: Make sure the ring light is plugged in.

step.cmd: Check that the AC/DC adapter is plugged securely into the ring light:
Check that the cord is plugged into an electrical outlet.

remedy.title: Make sure the electrical outlet you are using has power.

step.cmd: Plug in another device, like a lamp, or your phone charger, and checking that there is power going to that device.
